author: Alex Griswold
title: REPORT: DHS Secretary Only Learned Trump Signed Executive Order From TV
text:
REPORT: DHS Secretary Only Learned Trump Signed Executive Order From TV by Alex Griswold | 9:14 am, January 30th, 2017 
According to an account from The New York Times , Donald Trump ‘s own Secretary of Homeland Security only learned that the president had signed an executive order banning migrants from seven Islamic countries when another official saw it on the news. 
While flying back from Miami on a Coast Guard plane Saturday, Secretary John Kelly was on a conference call with several other top White House officials. He and the other officials were being briefed on what exactly was in the planned executive order. 
“Halfway into the briefing, someone on the call looked up at a television in his office,” the Times reports. “‘The president is signing the executive order that we’re discussing,’ the official said, stunned.” 
Per most reports, the executive order was written and pushed by the president’s political appointees, former congressional aide Stephen Miller and former Breitbart chief Steve Bannon . MSNBC reported Monday morning that those in the relevant agencies are furious with Miller in particular , and claim the order was signed without review from them or White House lawyers.
